de:
Familienhotel, Ruhe garantiert, jeglicher Komfort. WIFI
kurtaxe vor Ort zu zahlen.
en:
Family hotel, calm assured, all comfort. WIFI
tourist tax to be paid on site.
it:
Hotel a conduzione familiare, tranquillo, confortevole. WIFI
tassa di soggiorno da pagare in loco.
fr:
Hôtel familial, calme assuré, tout confort. WIFI
taxe de séjour à régler sur place.
es:
Hotel familiar, tranquilo, confortable. WIFI
tasa turística a pagar in situ.
nl:
Familiehotel, rustig, comfortabel. WIFI
toeristenbelasting ter plaatse te betalen.
